Major_Arcs.title: King Guz's Predicament and Alley's Debt Collection
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc encompasses the initial encounter with King Guz seemingly drowning, his rescue by Alley Oop, and the subsequent confrontation over an unpaid debt. It sets up Alley's character as opportunistic and King Guz as somewhat evasive.

sub_scenes.title: King Guz's 'Drowning' and Rescue
sub_scenes.description: King Guz is in distress in the water, seemingly drowning, prompting Alley Oop to perform a rescue, observed by a woman.

sub_scenes.title: The Unpaid Debt Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Immediately after the rescue, Alley Oop confronts King Guz about an old debt, revealing a possible ulterior motive behind his heroic act.

Major_Arcs.title: Bronto Soreness's Mishaps and the Dinosaur Trade-In
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Alley Oop and Bronto Soreness's journey, marked by Bronto's clumsiness, leading to the suggestion of trading him in. This culminates in a visit to a dinosaur dealership and the purchase of a new, smaller dinosaur, ending with a poignant farewell to the old dinosaur.

sub_scenes.title: Travel and Initial Tree Collision
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop and Bronto Soreness are traveling, but their journey is soon interrupted by Bronto's clumsiness.

narrative_arcs.title: Bronto Soreness Collides with a Tree

sub_scenes.title: Diagnosis and Trade-In Suggestion
sub_scenes.description: The recurring tree-bumping incident leads to a diagnosis of Bronto's old age, prompting the suggestion of trading him in for a newer model.

sub_scenes.title: Visiting Honest Zog's Dealership
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop and another character arrive at Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership, browsing the available dinosaurs.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership
Arrival at Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership

sub_scenes.title: Test Drive and Purchase
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop is offered a test drive of a smaller dinosaur, which despite a biting incident, leads to him deciding to purchase it.

narrative_arcs.title: Test Drive Offer at the Dinosaur Dealership
Test Drive Offer at the Dinosaur Dealership

sub_scenes.title: Farewell to Bronto Soreness
sub_scenes.description: The narrative concludes with a bittersweet farewell to the old dinosaur, Bronto Soreness, highlighting the emotional aspect of the trade-in.

narrative_arcs.title: Old Dinosaur Marked Down for Sale

Major_Arcs.title: New Dinosaur and Riding Mishaps
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Alley Oop's initial experiences with his new, smaller dinosaur, including instructions for its use and the inevitable riding mishaps, culminating in a fall and Dinny's scolding.

sub_scenes.title: Instructions and Initial Ride
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop receives instructions for his new dinosaur and begins his first ride.

sub_scenes.title: Dealership Sales and Customer Dissatisfaction
sub_scenes.description: A brief interlude at the dinosaur dealership showing contrasting customer experiences.

narrative_arcs.title: Dinosaur Salesman's Pitch and Dissatisfied Customer

sub_scenes.title: Fall and Dinny's Scolding
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop falls off the new dinosaur and is scolded by Dinny for his clumsiness.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinny's Dinosaur Defense and Impending Charge
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Dinny's emotional outburst about mistreatment and his overprotective reaction towards his dinosaur, leading to a potentially aggressive charge towards cave children.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Anger and Defense
sub_scenes.description: Dinny expresses anger about mistreatment and reacts strongly to perceived harm to his dinosaur.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Charge at Cave Children
sub_scenes.description: Dinny, fueled by his emotions, charges towards cave children playing nearby, creating suspense about his intentions.

Major_Arcs.title: Ooola and Alley's Breakup and Aftermath
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the escalating conflict between Alley Oop and Ooola, starting with a fishing invitation, leading to accusations and a breakup, and culminating in Ooola's violent act.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Invitation and Rejection
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop invites Ooola fishing, but she rejects him, setting the stage for conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Accusation and Breakup
sub_scenes.description: The rejection escalates into accusations, leading to a firm breakup declaration from Ooola.

sub_scenes.title: Stone Attack
sub_scenes.description: Ooola's anger culminates in a physical attack on Alley Oop with a large rock.

Major_Arcs.title: Misogynistic Fishing Trip and Romantic Rivalry
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a fishing trip where general misogynistic sentiments are expressed, followed by a romantic rivalry concerning Oola and demonstrations of flirtation and jealousy.

sub_scenes.title: Misogynistic Musings and Fishing Complaints
sub_scenes.description: Men on a fishing trip express negative generalizations about women and complain about noise disturbing the fish.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Silence and Misogynistic Retort

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Competition for Oola
sub_scenes.description: Cavemen discuss competition for Oola's affections, leading to arguments and demonstrations of flirtation and jealousy.

narrative_arcs.title: Surprise Meeting and Talk of Female Attention
Departure and Continued Doubt about Oola

sub_scenes.title: Jealousy, Misunderstanding, and Tender Care
sub_scenes.description: Misunderstandings about romantic intentions lead to violence and eventual clarification, followed by tender care for the actually intended recipient of affection.

sub_scenes.title: Romance Lessons and Rhyming Reflections
sub_scenes.description: Cavemen discuss romance, with one trying to teach the other about romantic techniques, leading to humorous reflections on the complexities of romance.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Gifts and Competitive Gifting
sub_scenes.description: Romantic gestures with flowers and branches lead to competitive gifting and humorous reactions.

sub_scenes.title: Vulgar Tree Climbing Observation
sub_scenes.description: A humorous observation about tree climbing being vulgar.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Jealousy and Misunderstandings
sub_scenes.description: Scenes of romantic jealousy, misunderstandings, and accusations, playing on relationship dynamics.

narrative_arcs.title: Romantic Tension and Loss of Control

sub_scenes.title: Infidelity Accusation and Romantic Reformation
sub_scenes.description: Accusations of infidelity and attempts at romantic reformation, exploring relationship conflicts and resolutions.

Major_Arcs.title: The Twitch Craze and Its Consequences
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc satirizes a dance craze called 'the twitch,' highlighting its unexpected consequences, from injuries to social pressure and humorous misunderstandings.

sub_scenes.title: The Twist's Toll and Pressure to Dance
sub_scenes.description: Injuries from 'the twist' dance are observed, and social pressure to participate is introduced.

sub_scenes.title: Twitch Dance Lesson and Misidentification
sub_scenes.description: A dance lesson for 'the twitch' leads to clumsy mishaps and a humorous name reveal of the instructor.

sub_scenes.title: Twitch Debrief, Prank, and Hospitalization
sub_scenes.description: The aftermath of a 'twitch' lesson leads to humiliation, a prank, and a surprising revelation about injuries from watching the dance.

narrative_arcs.title: Ants in the Pants Prank and Humiliation

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel for Research and Romantic Interlude
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc involves time travel as a solution to historical research, unexpectedly transporting characters to the present and back, with a romantic encounter intertwined.

sub_scenes.title: Research Problem and Time Travel Plan
sub_scenes.description: Researchers discuss the difficulty of historical research and propose time travel as a solution.

narrative_arcs.title: Research Problem and Time Travel Solution

sub_scenes.title: Time Travel and Prehistoric Romance
sub_scenes.description: Time travel leads to a romantic encounter in prehistoric times, setting the stage for unexpected transportation to the present.

narrative_arcs.title: Welcome to the 20th Century and the Spain Assignment
Justification for Interruption and Thesis Importance
Reassurance and Return to Ancient Spain

sub_scenes.title: Return to Ancient Spain
sub_scenes.description: Alley and Oola are returned to ancient Spain, with a brief reflection on their time travel experience.

narrative_arcs.title: Back in Ancient Spain and Alley's Comment

Major_Arcs.title: Buster's Serenade and Bullfight Mishap
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Buster's attempt at serenading, leading to chaos and violence, and his unexpected participation in a bullfight as a 'novelty act' after injuring the matador.

sub_scenes.title: Disruptive Serenade and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Buster's loud serenade causes disturbance and confrontation, leading to physical altercation.

narrative_arcs.title: The Racket and the Dame on the Balcony
The Girlfriend's Fury and Matador's Identity

sub_scenes.title: Novelty Bullfight and Audience Reaction
sub_scenes.description: Due to Don Jose's incapacitation, Buster becomes a 'novelty' bullfighter, facing a bull with audience commentary and reactions.

narrative_arcs.title: Don Jose's Unconsciousness and the Delayed Bullfight
Desperate Measures and a Novelty Act
Audience Critique of the Novelty Matador

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Misunderstandings and Anticipated Kiss
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features romantic misunderstandings, accusations, and a delayed kiss, intertwined with a scientist's research and time travel attempts.

sub_scenes.title: Impatient Wait and Flirtatious Exchange
sub_scenes.description: A woman impatiently waits for information while another couple engages in a flirtatious exchange.

sub_scenes.title: Rescue, Reunion, and Jealous Accusation
sub_scenes.description: A rescue scene leads to a reunion and jealous accusation, linking back to the scientist's research.

Major_Arcs.title: King for a Day - Manipulation and Humor
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the theme of 'King for a Day,' using it as a vehicle for manipulation and humor, highlighting the contrast between perceived power and actual experience.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to 'King for a Day'
sub_scenes.description: The concept of 'King for a Day' is introduced with a scene of forced labor and ironic hailing.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Burden of Kingship
sub_scenes.description: The 'king' faces shadowy figures and engages in dialogue about the perceived ease of kingship.

narrative_arcs.title: Dialogue on the Burden of Kingship

sub_scenes.title: Temporary King Appointment and Public Humiliation
sub_scenes.description: A temporary king is appointed, but the public's reaction is manipulated by the previous king for his amusement.

narrative_arcs.title: New King's Proclamation and Former King's Command
Mob's Rejection and Former King's Justification

sub_scenes.title: New King's Isolation and Former King's Satisfaction
sub_scenes.description: The new king experiences isolation, while the former king revels in his manipulative success.

narrative_arcs.title: New King's Isolation and Cave Improvement

Major_Arcs.title: Guz and the Ulcer Pills - Domestic Dispute
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc revolves around Guz's misunderstanding about his ulcer pills and a domestic dispute with the Queen over his dirty feet, highlighting humorous domestic tensions.

sub_scenes.title: Bon-Bon Indulgence and Ulcer Pill Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Guz enjoys 'bon-bons' which are revealed to be ulcer pills by the disgusted Queen.

narrative_arcs.title: Bon-Bons Revealed as Ulcer Pills and Queen's Disgust

sub_scenes.title: Dirty Feet Punishment and Sarcastic Bath
sub_scenes.description: The Queen punishes Guz for dirty feet, leading to Guz's sarcastic compliance and a 'vacation' in the tub.

narrative_arcs.title: True Cause of Queen's Anger: Filthy Feet

Major_Arcs.title: Clam Dispute and Wise Man's Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc humorously deals with a dispute over found clams, resolved unconventionally by a Wise Man, highlighting simple yet effective problem-solving.

sub_scenes.title: Accusation of Cheating and Money Fight
sub_scenes.description: A commotion arises from accusations of cheating and a physical fight over money.

narrative_arcs.title: Fight Over Money and Royal Observation

sub_scenes.title: Dispute Clarification and Wise Man's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: The dispute is clarified as being over found clams, leading to the crowned man seeking the Wise Man's help.

narrative_arcs.title: Summoning the Wise Man for Resolution
Wise Man Consulted on the Argument

sub_scenes.title: Resolution by Clam Confiscation
sub_scenes.description: The Wise Man resolves the dispute by taking the clams, removing the source of conflict.

Major_Arcs.title: Recurring Fights, Royal Dinner, and Sudden Attack
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features recurring disruptive fights, a royal dinner scene with health warnings, and a sudden, unexpected violent attack.

sub_scenes.title: Recurring Fight and Financial Accusation
sub_scenes.description: A recurring fight breaks out, followed by a financial accusation within the royal setting.

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Dinner and Ulcer Warning
sub_scenes.description: Dinner is announced for the crowned man, leading to a dining scene with health warnings about his ulcer.

sub_scenes.title: Peek-a-boo Prank Turns Violent
sub_scenes.description: A playful 'peek-a-boo' prank abruptly turns into a violent attack, creating a shocking tonal shift.

Major_Arcs.title: Apologies, Status Change, and Ruler Proposition
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc presents various scenarios: an apology following an unseen action, another heartfelt apology with a food offering, a return to ordinary life from palace life, and a surprising proposition to become a ruler.

sub_scenes.title: Oompa's and Pal's Apologies
sub_scenes.description: Two distinct apology scenes: one confusing and one heartfelt with a food offering.

narrative_arcs.title: Pal's Profound Apology and Food Offering

sub_scenes.title: Return to Ordinary Life
sub_scenes.description: A character expresses relief at returning to ordinary citizen status after palace life.

sub_scenes.title: Ruler Proposition and Board Measurement Strangeness
sub_scenes.description: A proposition to become ruler and a separate scene involving board measurement and strange reactions.

Major_Arcs.title: Fortune Telling and Forced Shaving - 'Barberous Act'
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc, titled 'A Barberous Act,' sets up a fortune-telling scenario that leads to a violent and humorous forced shaving incident.

sub_scenes.title: Fortune Telling Setup
sub_scenes.description: A woman visits a fortune teller, setting up anticipation for meeting a 'bearded stranger'.

sub_scenes.title: Ooola's Wait and Forced Shaving Setup
sub_scenes.description: Ooola waits as a hairy man departs, leading to a scene of forced shaving.

narrative_arcs.title: Moo Tonsorial Parlor and Forced Shaving

Major_Arcs.title: Time Machine Experiment and Unexpected Visitor
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts a scientist's time machine experiment, which unexpectedly brings a Roman soldier to the present, leading to humorous and unforeseen consequences.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Setup
sub_scenes.description: A scientist prepares his time machine to bring someone from the past to the present.

sub_scenes.title: Unexpected Roman Soldier Materialization
sub_scenes.description: The time machine experiment results in the unexpected arrival of a Roman soldier.
